mapper.insert: insert into exam (examId, region, questionType, questionNum, questionInfo, errorQuestion, score) values (#{examId}, #{region}, #{questionType}, #{questionNum}, #{questionInfo}, #{errorQuestion}, #{score})
mapper.update: update exam set exam.examId = #{examId}, exam.region = #{region}, exam.questionType = #{questionType}, exam.questionNum = #{questionNum}, exam.questionInfo = #{questionInfo}, exam.errorQuestion = #{errorQuestion}, exam.score = #{score} where exam.examId = #{examId}
